devdoc.details: Payment processing system supporting multiple payment methods Allows students to make payments to merchants using VNDC or other tokens

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

SafeERC20FailedOperation(address).details: An operation with an ERC-20 token failed.

getLinkedWallet(address,string).details: Get wallet ID linked to payment method

getMerchantPayments(address).details: Get all payments for a merchant

getStudentPayments(address).details: Get all payments for a student

getTotalMerchantRevenue(address).details: Get total payments received by merchant

getTotalStudentPayments(address).details: Get total payments made by student

isPaymentMethodSupported(string).details: Check if a payment method is supported

linkWallet(string,string).details: Link a wallet to a payment method

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

processPayment(address,uint256,string).details: Process a payment from student to merchant

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

unlinkWallet(string).details: Unlink a wallet from a payment method

devdoc.title: PaymentProcessor
